con:testCase.name: Create and Retrieve TriggerSend Definiton-With UserNamePass

con:testStep.name: Groovy Script to Create Object Name

con:transfers.con:name: ObjectName
con:transfers.con:sourceStep: Groovy Script to Create Object Name

con:request.name: Create Email
con:request.con:request:
${Create 2.0 Account/User with PartnerKey#UserID} ${Create 2.0 Account/User with PartnerKey#Password} ${#TestCase#objectName} Email ${#TestCase#objectName} The content of the body element is displayed in your browser. This was sent by a TS Async email.
This email was sent to: %%emailaddr%%

Email Sent By: %%Member_Busname%%
%%Member_Addr%% %%Member_City%%, %%Member_State%%, %%Member_PostalCode%%, %%Member_Country%%

Update Profile ]]> Async TS ${#TestCase#objectName} true

con:request.name: Create Sender Profile
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <soapenv:Header> <wsse:Security soapenv:mustUnderstand="1" xmlns:wsse="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-secext-1.0.xsd" xmlns:wsu="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd"> <wsse:UsernameToken wsu:Id="UsernameToken-340466"> <wsse:Username>${Create 2.0 Account/User with PartnerKey#UserID}</wsse:Username> <wsse:Password Type="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-username-token-profile-1.0#PasswordText">${Create 2.0 Account/User with PartnerKey#Password}</wsse:Password> </wsse:UsernameToken> </wsse:Security> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <CreateRequest xmlns="http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI"> <Options/> <Objects xsi:type="SenderProfile"> <PartnerKey xsi:nil="true"/> <ObjectID xsi:nil="true"/> <Name>API Created Sender Profile ${#TestCase#objectName}</Name> <CustomerKey>${#TestCase#objectName}</CustomerKey> <Description>API Created Sender Profile</Description> <FromName>Uriah Heep</FromName> <FromAddress>uheep@mailinator.com</FromAddress> </Objects> </CreateRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:testStep.name: Create Delivery Profile With Account Defaults

con:request.name: Create Delivery Profile With Account Defaults
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <soapenv:Header> <wsse:Security soapenv:mustUnderstand="1" xmlns:wsse="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-secext-1.0.xsd" xmlns:wsu="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd"> <wsse:UsernameToken wsu:Id="UsernameToken-340466"> <wsse:Username>${Create 2.0 Account/User with PartnerKey#UserID}</wsse:Username> <wsse:Password Type="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-username-token-profile-1.0#PasswordText">${Create 2.0 Account/User with PartnerKey#Password}</wsse:Password> </wsse:UsernameToken> </wsse:Security> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <CreateRequest xmlns="http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI"> <Options/> <ns1:Objects xsi:type="ns1:DeliveryProfile" xmlns:ns1="http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI"> <ns1:PartnerKey xsi:nil="true"/> <ns1:ModifiedDate xsi:nil="true"/> <ns1:ObjectID xsi:nil="true"/> <ns1:CustomerKey>${#TestCase#objectName}</ns1:CustomerKey> <ns1:Name>DeliveryP ${#TestCase#objectName}</ns1:Name> <ns1:SourceAddressType>DefaultPrivateIPAddress</ns1:SourceAddressType> <ns1:DomainType>DefaultDomain</ns1:DomainType> </ns1:Objects> </CreateRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Create Send Classification - Commercial
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <soapenv:Header> <wsse:Security soapenv:mustUnderstand="1" xmlns:wsse="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-secext-1.0.xsd" xmlns:wsu="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd"> <wsse:UsernameToken wsu:Id="UsernameToken-340466"> <wsse:Username>${Create 2.0 Account/User with PartnerKey#UserID}</wsse:Username> <wsse:Password Type="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-username-token-profile-1.0#PasswordText">${Create 2.0 Account/User with PartnerKey#Password}</wsse:Password> </wsse:UsernameToken> </wsse:Security> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <CreateRequest xmlns="http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI"> <Options/> <ns1:Objects xsi:type="ns1:SendClassification" xmlns:ns1="http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI"> <ns1:PartnerKey xsi:nil="true"/> <ns1:ModifiedDate xsi:nil="true"/> <ns1:ObjectID xsi:nil="true"/> <ns1:SendClassificationType>Marketing</ns1:SendClassificationType> <ns1:CustomerKey>${#TestCase#objectName}</ns1:CustomerKey> <ns1:Name>SClass ${#TestCase#objectName}</ns1:Name> <ns1:SenderProfile> <ns1:PartnerKey xsi:nil="true"/> <ns1:ModifiedDate xsi:nil="true"/> <ns1:ObjectID xsi:nil="true"/> <ns1:CustomerKey>${#TestCase#objectName}</ns1:CustomerKey> </ns1:SenderProfile> <ns1:DeliveryProfile> <ns1:PartnerKey xsi:nil="true"/> <ns1:ModifiedDate xsi:nil="true"/> <ns1:ObjectID xsi:nil="true"/> <ns1:CustomerKey>${#TestCase#objectName}</ns1:CustomerKey> </ns1:DeliveryProfile> </ns1:Objects> </CreateRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Retrieve Email by CustomerKey
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <soapenv:Header> <wsse:Security soapenv:mustUnderstand="1" xmlns:wsse="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-secext-1.0.xsd" xmlns:wsu="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd"> <wsse:UsernameToken wsu:Id="UsernameToken-340466"> <wsse:Username>${Create 2.0 Account/User with PartnerKey#UserID}</wsse:Username> <wsse:Password Type="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-username-token-profile-1.0#PasswordText">${Create 2.0 Account/User with PartnerKey#Password}</wsse:Password> </wsse:UsernameToken> </wsse:Security> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <RetrieveRequestMsg xmlns="http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI"> <RetrieveRequest> <ObjectType>Email</ObjectType> <Properties>ID</Properties> <Properties>Name</Properties> <Filter xsi:type="SimpleFilterPart"> <Property>CustomerKey</Property> <SimpleOperator>equals</SimpleOperator> <Value>${#TestCase#objectName}</Value> </Filter> </RetrieveRequest> </RetrieveRequestMsg> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Retrieve Send Classification by CustomerKey
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <soapenv:Header> <wsse:Security soapenv:mustUnderstand="1" xmlns:wsse="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-secext-1.0.xsd" xmlns:wsu="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd"> <wsse:UsernameToken wsu:Id="UsernameToken-340466"> <wsse:Username>${Create 2.0 Account/User with PartnerKey#UserID}</wsse:Username> <wsse:Password Type="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-username-token-profile-1.0#PasswordText">${Create 2.0 Account/User with PartnerKey#Password}</wsse:Password> </wsse:UsernameToken> </wsse:Security> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <RetrieveRequestMsg xmlns="http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI"> <RetrieveRequest> <ObjectType>SendClassification</ObjectType> <Properties>ObjectID</Properties> <Properties>CustomerKey</Properties> <Properties>Name</Properties> <Filter xsi:type="SimpleFilterPart"> <Property>CustomerKey</Property> <SimpleOperator>equals</SimpleOperator> <Value>${#TestCase#objectName}</Value> </Filter> </RetrieveRequest> </RetrieveRequestMsg> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Create Triggered Send Definition
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">\r <soapenv:Header> <wsse:Security soapenv:mustUnderstand="1" xmlns:wsse="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-secext-1.0.xsd" xmlns:wsu="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd"> <wsse:UsernameToken wsu:Id="UsernameToken-340466"> <wsse:Username>${Create 2.0 Account/User with PartnerKey#UserID}</wsse:Username> <wsse:Password Type="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-username-token-profile-1.0#PasswordText">${Create 2.0 Account/User with PartnerKey#Password}</wsse:Password> </wsse:UsernameToken> </wsse:Security> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body>\r <CreateRequest xmlns="http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI">\r <Options/>\r <ns1:Objects xsi:type="ns1:TriggeredSendDefinition" xmlns:ns1="http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI">\r <ns1:CustomerKey>${#TestCase#objectName}</ns1:CustomerKey> <ns1:ModifiedDate xsi:nil="true"/>\r <ns1:ObjectID xsi:nil="true"/>\r <ns1:CustomerKey>${#TestCase#objectName}</ns1:CustomerKey>\r <ns1:Name>TSDef ${#TestCase#objectName}</ns1:Name>\r <ns1:SendClassification>\r <ns1:PartnerKey>PartnerKey${#TestCase#objectName}</ns1:PartnerKey>\r <ns1:ModifiedDate xsi:nil="true"/>\r <ns1:ObjectID>${Retrieve Send Classification by CustomerKey#Response#declare namespace ns1='http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI'; //ns1:RetrieveResponseMsg[1]/ns1:Results[1]/ns1:ObjectID[1]}</ns1:ObjectID>\r </ns1:SendClassification>\r <ns1:SuppressTracking>false</ns1:SuppressTracking>\r <ns1:TriggeredSendType>Continuous</ns1:TriggeredSendType>\r <ns1:Email>\r <ns1:PartnerKey xsi:nil="true"/>\r <ns1:ModifiedDate xsi:nil="true"/>\r <ns1:ID>${Retrieve Email by CustomerKey#Response#declare namespace ns1='http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI'; //ns1:RetrieveResponseMsg[1]/ns1:Results[1]/ns1:ID[1]}</ns1:ID>\r </ns1:Email>\r <ns1:BatchInterval>0</ns1:BatchInterval>\r </ns1:Objects>\r </CreateRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: TriggerSendDefinition Retrieve
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <soapenv:Header> <wsse:Security soapenv:mustUnderstand="1" xmlns:wsse="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-secext-1.0.xsd" xmlns:wsu="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd"> <wsse:UsernameToken wsu:Id="UsernameToken-340466"> <wsse:Username>${Create 2.0 Account/User with PartnerKey#UserID}</wsse:Username> <wsse:Password Type="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-username-token-profile-1.0#PasswordText">${Create 2.0 Account/User with PartnerKey#Password}</wsse:Password> </wsse:UsernameToken> </wsse:Security> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <RetrieveRequestMsg xmlns="http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI"> <RetrieveRequest> <ObjectType>TriggeredSendDefinition</ObjectType> <Properties>PartnerKey</Properties> <Properties>ObjectID</Properties> <Properties>Client.PartnerClientKey</Properties> <Properties>Name</Properties> </RetrieveRequest> </RetrieveRequestMsg> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: TriggerSendDefinition Retrieve with Client.PartnerClientFilter
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <soapenv:Header> <wsse:Security soapenv:mustUnderstand="1" xmlns:wsse="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-secext-1.0.xsd" xmlns:wsu="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd"> <wsse:UsernameToken wsu:Id="UsernameToken-340466"> <wsse:Username>${Create 2.0 Account/User with PartnerKey#UserID}</wsse:Username> <wsse:Password Type="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-username-token-profile-1.0#PasswordText">${Create 2.0 Account/User with PartnerKey#Password}</wsse:Password> </wsse:UsernameToken> </wsse:Security> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <RetrieveRequestMsg xmlns="http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI"> <RetrieveRequest> <ObjectType>TriggeredSendDefinition</ObjectType> <Properties>PartnerKey</Properties> <Properties>ObjectID</Properties> <Properties>Client.PartnerClientKey</Properties> <Properties>Name</Properties> <ns1:Filter xsi:type="ns1:SimpleFilterPart" xmlns:ns1="http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI"> <ns1:Property>Client.PartnerClientKey</ns1:Property> <ns1:SimpleOperator>equals</ns1:SimpleOperator> <ns1:Value>${Create 2.0 Account/User with PartnerKey#PartnerKey}</ns1:Value> </ns1:Filter> </RetrieveRequest> </RetrieveRequestMsg> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
